channel.title: CVE Feed for Synology -- Synology Video Station
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Synology -- Synology Video Station

item.title: CVE-2021-33181|2024-09-17T03:34:24.558Z -- synology -- synology%20video%20station
item.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in webapi component in Synology Video Station before 2.4.10-1632 allows remote authenticated users to send arbitrary request to intranet resources via unspecified vectors.
